sqlMap.sql: sell.id as sell_id, sell.id_profesional as sell_id_profesional, sell.type as sell_type, sell.id_prod_serv as sell_id_prod_serv, sell.item as sell_item, sell.referenceprice as sell_referenceprice, sell.approved as sell_approved, sell.deleted as sell_deleted
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from SELL sell
order by $orderByClause$

select
from SELL sell where sell.id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.delete: delete from sell using SELL sell
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into SELL (id_profesional, type, id_prod_serv, item, referenceprice, approved, deleted) values (#idProfesional:INTEGER#, #type:INTEGER#, #idProdServ:INTEGER#, #item:VARCHAR#, #referenceprice:DECIMAL#, #approved:INTEGER#, #deleted:INTEGER#)

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into SELL
id_profesional
type
id_prod_serv
item
referenceprice
approved
deleted
)
values
#idProfesional:INTEGER#
#type:INTEGER#
#idProdServ:INTEGER#
#item:VARCHAR#
#referenceprice:DECIMAL#
#approved:INTEGER#
#deleted:INTEGER#
)
sqlMap.update:
update SELL sell
sell.id = #record.id:INTEGER#
sell.id_profesional = #record.idProfesional:INTEGER#
sell.type = #record.type:INTEGER#
sell.id_prod_serv = #record.idProdServ:INTEGER#
sell.item = #record.item:VARCHAR#
sell.referenceprice = #record.referenceprice:DECIMAL#
sell.approved = #record.approved:INTEGER#
sell.deleted = #record.deleted:INTEGER#

update SELL sell set sell.id = #record.id:INTEGER#, sell.id_profesional = #record.idProfesional:INTEGER#, sell.type = #record.type:INTEGER#, sell.id_prod_serv = #record.idProdServ:INTEGER#, sell.item = #record.item:VARCHAR#, sell.referenceprice = #record.referenceprice:DECIMAL#, sell.approved = #record.approved:INTEGER#, sell.deleted = #record.deleted:INTEGER#

update SELL
id_profesional = #idProfesional:INTEGER#
type = #type:INTEGER#
id_prod_serv = #idProdServ:INTEGER#
item = #item:VARCHAR#
referenceprice = #referenceprice:DECIMAL#
approved = #approved:INTEGER#
deleted = #deleted:INTEGER#
where id = #id:INTEGER#

update SELL set id_profesional = #idProfesional:INTEGER#, type = #type:INTEGER#, id_prod_serv = #idProdServ:INTEGER#, item = #item:VARCHAR#, referenceprice = #referenceprice:DECIMAL#, approved = #approved:INTEGER#, deleted = #deleted:INTEGER# where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory, IF(g4.id=#geo4id:INTEGER#,"1","4") ordercol from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod, PROFESIONAL prof, GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and sell.type = 1 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and prod.approved = 1 and prod.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 union all select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory, "2" ordercol from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof, GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4, SERVICE_AREA sa where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and sa.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and prof.id = sa.id_profesional and sa.level = 4 and sa.id_geolevel = #geo4id:INTEGER# union all select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory, IF(g4.id=#geo4id:INTEGER#,"3","5") ordercol from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof, GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0 and not exists (select sa.* from SERVICE_AREA sa where sa.id_profesional = prof.id) order by ordercol

select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod, PROFESIONAL prof,GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and prod.id_category = #catid:INTEGER# and sell.type = 1 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and prod.approved = 1 and prod.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, null as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, prod.id_category as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod where sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and sell.id_profesional = #id:INTEGER# and sell.type = 1

select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod, PROFESIONAL prof,GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and prod.id_category in
#[]#
and sell.type = 1 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and prod.approved = 1 and prod.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and serv.id_category = #catid:INTEGER# and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, null as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, serv.id_category as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and sell.id_profesional = #id:INTEGER# and sell.type = 2

select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and serv.id_category in
#[]#
and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod, PROFESIONAL prof, GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id = #id:INTEGER# and sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and sell.type = 1 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and prod.approved = 1 and prod.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof where sell.id = #id:INTEGER# and sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0

select , prod.name as name, prod.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, g2.nombre as geo2name, g3.nombre as geo3name, g4.nombre as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_PRODUCT prod, PROFESIONAL prof, GEO2 g2, GEO3 g3, GEO4 g4 where sell.id_prod_serv = prod.id and sell.type = 1 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and prof.id_geolevel = g4.id and g4.geo3_id = g3.id and g3.geo2_id = g2.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and prod.approved = 1 and prod.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0
prod.name LIKE #name:VARCHAR#
prof.businessname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR#

select , serv.name as name, serv.description as description, prof.businessname as profesionalbusinessname, null as geo2name, null as geo3name, null as geo4name, 0 as idCategory from SELL sell, PROF_SERVICE serv, PROFESIONAL prof where sell.id_prod_serv = serv.id and sell.type = 2 and sell.id_profesional = prof.id and sell.approved = 1 and sell.deleted = 0 and serv.approved = 1 and serv.deleted = 0 and prof.status = 2 and prof.deleted = 0
serv.name LIKE #name:VARCHAR#
prof.businessname LIKE #profesionalBusinessname:VARCHAR#
